GV06vaitss_u:2333: saṃ tvāṃ gandharvāḥ sam u yuñjantv āpo nadyoḥ sāṃvaidye parivatsarāya /
GV06vaitss_u:2334: ye tvā rakṣanti sadam apramādaṃ tebhya āyuḥ savitā bodhi gopāya [-]> iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2340: svargeṇa lokena saṃprorṇuvāthām adhāma sakthyor ava gudaṃ dhehi /
GV06vaitss_u:2341: arvāñcam añjim ā bhara yat strīṇāṃ jīvabhojanam [cf. VSM 23.20 + TS 7.4.19.1]> iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2343: ūrdhvām enām ucchrayatād girau bhāraṃ harann iva /
GV06vaitss_u:2344: athāsyai madhyam edhatu śīte vāte punann iva [VSM 23.26-27]> iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2350: pṛcchāmi tvā citaye devasakha yadi tvaṃ tatra manasā jagantha /
GV06vaitss_u:2351: keṣu viṣṇus triṣu padeṣu jiṣṇuḥ keṣv idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa [VSM 23.49]> iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2353: pañcasv antaḥ puruṣa āviveśa tāny antaḥ puruṣa ārpitāni /
GV06vaitss_u:2354: etat tvātra pratimanvāno asmi na yajñapā bhavasy uttaro mat [VSM 23.52]> //
GV06vaitss_u:2355: <na tvaṃ paro 'varo man na pūrvaḥ kim aṅga vā matiman kṣama tena /
GV06vaitss_u:2356: śikṣeṇyāṃ vadasi vācam enāṃ na mayā tvaṃ saṃsamako bhavāsi [-]> iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2358: pṛcchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ [9.10.13]> iti /
GV06vaitss_u:2365: <7.2.8> (37.8) pratyṛtu ṣaṭ paśava āgneyā aindrā mārutā maitrāvaruṇā aindrāvaruṇā āgnāvaiṣṇavā iti //
GV06vaitss_u:2369: <7.2.11-12> (37.11-12) caitryāḥ purastād varadānānta iṣṭayo 'gnaye kāmāya dātre pathikṛte //

GV06vaitss_u:2377: <7.2.15> (37.15) yadi brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vā pratipadyeta siddhaṃ karmety ācakṣate //
GV06vaitss_u:2378: <7.2.16> (37.16) na cet pratipadyeta nediṣṭhaṃ sapatnaṃ vijitya tena yajeta //

GV06vaitss_u:2386: <7.2.20> (37.20) saṃvatsaram iṣṭayaḥ pathyāyai svastaye adityā anumataye //

GV06vaitss_u:2420: gāvo yavaṃ prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ /

GV06vaitss_u:2539: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā [20.117]> iti //
